skills.description: Attacks 1 enemy. Has a 20% chance of placing a [Stun] debuff for 1 turn.
Places a 50% [Increase ATK] buff and a 60% [Increase DEF] buff on all allies for 2 turns. Also places a [Block Damage] buff for 1 turn on allies with less than 30% HP.
[Active Effect] Places a [Shield] buff equal to 15% of this Champion’s MAX HP on all allies for 3 turns.
books: [Passive Effect] Heals each ally by 15% of this Champion’s MAX HP whenever a [Shield] buff placed by this Skill expires, is removed, or is broken by an enemy attack. Allies whose [Shield] buffs are broken will also counterattack the enemy that breaks the [Shield]. When a [Shield] is broken, the heal occurs instantly before any remaining damage from the Shield-breaking attack is taken.
